name: Black Dawn Technomage
overview: After the Infamous events at Base DS97 Brenn barely escaped with his life. The Horrors of the Black Dawn left behind him in the burnt crater of that desolate, haunted moon. Or so he thought…… Slowly, the horrors infiltrated Brenn`s mind, through dreams twisting the thoughts, morals and his very soul. The Black Dawn lived on driving the once proud hero into the one thing he thought so hard to defeat. Driven mad and paranoid, fearful of the demons he fought, Brenn built a fortress to protect himself and populated the fortress with robot protectors to keep the world, and the Demons at bay, The loneliness and Isolation got worse as the fortress expanded taking over the small moon that it was based upon wiping out the local population until only he remained. You have been hired to enact revenge for the relatives of the fallen.
